content.title: Casa Selection – For special holiday moments

content.text:
Leave everyday life behind when you start your holiday and dive straight into moments of relaxation - this is perfectly possible when staying in one of the holiday homes and apartments in our Casa Selection collection. If you want to treat yourself to something special for your well-deserved holiday, you will find selected holiday accommodation, most of which are 5-star rated, at Casa Selection, including excellent amenities and unique locations. Some with a pool, others with other facilities, these holiday homes and apartments offer you the perfect setting for limitless holiday enjoyment. Here you can relax in a unique ambience and at the same time enjoy the independence, privacy and flexibility that a holiday in a holiday home or apartment offers you.

How about a magnificent country house in Tuscany, a modern villa in Croatia or an extraordinary finca on the island of Mallorca?
Let us inspire you and book an unforgettable break in your own dream holiday accommodation!

elements.title: Why Interchalet?
elements.caption:
A simple apartment or an exclusive villa with private pool. In the mountains and by the sea, in summer and winter. At Interchalet you will find the right accommodation for your dream holiday in a holiday home.
We currently have approx. 40.000 holiday houses and holiday apartments for your holidays!

elements.title: Spending time in a holiday home is the ideal solution for everyone!
elements.caption:
If you would like to enjoy a relaxing holiday as a couple or with family and friends, then you will love spending time in a holiday home or holiday apartment.
You can spend your holiday your way, in typical accommodation for your destination so you can quickly get familiar with the country and its people. An individual and unique holiday experience. Together we can find the ideal destination for your holiday based on your interests and preferences.
